gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.q1: How do I create my first habit?
gettingStarted.a1: Click the 'Create Habit' button on the Habits page. Fill in the name, description, frequency, and target count. You can also set a daily reminder time to receive notifications.
gettingStarted.q2: Can I set habits for specific days of the week?
gettingStarted.a2: Yes! When creating a habit, you can choose 'Weekly' frequency and select specific days of the week when you want to track that habit. This is perfect for habits like 'Gym on Monday, Wednesday, Friday'.

tracking.title: Tracking & Progress
tracking.q1: How do I log a habit completion?
tracking.a1: Click on any habit card to view details, then click 'Log Progress'. You can log multiple completions if your target is more than 1. You can also quick-log from the dashboard.
tracking.q2: What do the different colors mean?
tracking.a2: Green indicates completed habits, yellow shows partially completed (for habits with targets), and gray represents habits not yet tracked for the day. Red indicates missed habits from previous days.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.q1: How is my completion rate calculated?
analytics.a1: Your completion rate is the percentage of habit targets you've met over a given period. For daily habits, it's calculated daily. For weekly habits, it considers the entire week.
analytics.q2: Can I export my habit data?
analytics.a2: Currently, data export is not available but is on our roadmap. Stay tuned for updates! In the meantime, you can view comprehensive statistics on the Analytics page.

account.title: Account & Security
account.q1: How do I change my password?
account.a1: Go to Settings > Security and click 'Change Password'. You'll need to enter your current password and then your new password twice to confirm.
account.q2: How do I manage my active sessions?
account.a2: In Settings > Active Sessions, you can view all devices where you're logged in. You can revoke access from any device or log out from all devices at once for security.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.q1: How do I set up reminders?
notifications.a1: When creating or editing a habit, set the 'Daily Reminder' time. You'll receive a notification at that time reminding you to complete your habit.
notifications.a2: Yes, you can set custom reminder times for each habit. Go to the habit detail page and configure the notification schedule that works best for you.

installApp.title: Install App
installApp.subtitle: Install Ethos as an app on your device
installApp.pwaDesc: Install Ethos as an app for quick access, offline support, and a native app experience.
installApp.chrome: Click the install icon in the address bar, or Menu → "Install Ethos"
installApp.safariMac: File → "Add to Dock" or Share → "Add to Dock"
installApp.devNote: Note: In development mode, the install prompt may not appear automatically. Build the production version to test the full PWA experience.
